mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_Id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.status, p.views, p.image_Path As imageUrl , u.nickname AS nickname FROM Posts p JOIN Users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts ( user_id, zodiac_Id, title, content, image_path, views, status ) VALUES ( #{user_Id}, #{zodiacId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE Posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_Path = #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE Posts SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
